attributes.additional_details:
There is a snicket at the side of school which is used by parents and children up to 4 times a day.
we are wanting to make the snicket:
1) clean...there is alot of dog owners who are not picking up after the dogs.
2) to make the path wider and level..you struggle to get a pram up and people struggle to pass each other
3) for the trees/grass/bushes to be trimmed more often then once a year.
we have full support of the school with this and it is been organised by parents.
